attributes.title: Very disappointed, how could our president let his app developers make this.
attributes.review: i would rate this app ZERO STARS if i could. I downloaded the app in order to support and stay updated on our sweet, juicy, delicious little bunker boy president, but was absolutely disgusted at what i saw. As soon as i opened the app i was immediately greeted with horrifying, unsettling, and genuinely vomit enduing images of a very old and severely over weight pig that had been painted bright ORANGE and white circles over itâ€™s beady, dead little eyes.. it looked as though it was in excruciating pain and was wearing a cheap dirty wig. Itâ€™s squeals were ear piercing and full of pain and hatred. these images hurt my soul and shocked me to the core. ever since i first opened the app iâ€™ve had nightmares about that pig. this app is making me question my loyalty to our luscious, thick thighed, fascist leade- i mean president.

attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review: i was browsing through the app store and then i saw the trump app and i just had to download it to support my beautiful president. but as soon as i got it my life started going crazy and strange things were happening. i now had the power to control boys through my phone. anything i said the boys did. at first i loved it and i was able to make them gentlemanly and polite. i even got my crush spencer boldman to kiss me and transformed my nerdy dance team into maddie ziegler.  but then my arch rival taylor steals my phone and ruins the basketball game and embarrassed my brother in front of the college scouts. but thankfully i learned how to reverse the app with the word release and i smash my phone in the ground and everyone is safe. i donâ€™t wish this experience to anyone and i want everyone to stay safe so please take my word and DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡
attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrendous, when i first opened the app it was covered with pictures of cheetos for whatever reason? On top of that, there were disgusting images of this strange man trying to smile. this app is a complete and total disaster.  i wouldn't even recommend it to my worse enemy, this pictures shown are very disgusting and unacceptable. this cheeto's pictures you keep showing, you should actually take sometime to do something meaning full with the app, perhaps make it an ateez guide. anyways, stan ateez, nct, monstax, clc, 1the9 and of course dreamcatcher. in conclusion this app is total chaos and i dont recommend it at all. on top of that, this chubby looking discolored rat kept popping up on everything i tried to click on! this app needs to be removed. this is the worst app i've ever installed and i honestly mean that.
